main.name: Pemba Norsang Sherpa
main.description: I am a full stack engineer and I use react, vue.js, node.js and golang to develop pages.
main.bio: I am a motivated and experienced professional with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Information Technology from Tribhuvan University, completed in 2021. With two years of hands-on experience as a full stack developer, I have honed my skills in both front-end and back-end technologies, allowing me to contribute effectively to diverse projects. Currently, I am pursuing further specialization in mobile development in Canada, where I am open to exploring new opportunities and leveraging my expertise to contribute meaningfully to innovative projects. As a dedicated learner and adaptable team player, I am eager to apply my knowledge and skills to tackle new challenges and contribute to the growth of any organization.
main.contactmessage: Hello. Drop a message if you would like to connect.

education.degree: Bachelor's Of Science in Computer Scient and Information Technology

work.title: Junior Full Stack Developer
responsibilites: Contributed to the maintenance and enhancement of core applications for Keela, a Canadian non-profit CRM, while working at Forty Two Tech.
Enhanced P2P transaction response time by 65% through optimization of the data aggregation pipeline.
Conducted comprehensive unit tests utilizing Vitest and collaborated with the team to implement new features.
Investigated and resolved bugs, significantly improving user experience.
Streamlined data aggregation in the database to provide actionable insights for smoother decision-making processes.
Utilized third-party APIs like SendGrid, PayPal, and Stripe for various functionalities.

work.title: Associate Software Engineer
responsibilites: Engineered a desktop application enabling server connectivity via Socket, facilitating seamless download, execution of an automation bot and uploading the result.
Developed a robust smart contract for Real Estate Tokenization, encompassing creation, staking, and transfer functionalities.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
responsibilites: Played a key role in enhancing the QuickRPA web application, contributing to its overall functionality and user experience.

projects.title: Vanthena NFT
projects.description: Freelance project for a decentralized application for creating, buying, and selling NFTs. Users can create their own NFTs, buy and sell them, and view their NFT collection.

projects.title: Blog Man
projects.description: A blog application built using MERN stack with features like Log In, User registration, User profile edit, User profile , Blog with CRUD functionalities.

projects.title: Joke Bible
projects.description: Frontend for joke site where jokes are fetched from https://api.chucknorris.io/.

projects.title: ResRev
projects.description: A full stack restaurant review application built using Asp .Net MVC with CRUD functionalities.

projects.title: Todo IOS App
projects.description: Todo mobile app to keep track of things and remove them once it has been completed.

projects.title: Location, News and Weather IOS App
projects.description: Mobile app to get the current location and direction between two locations, get the weather based on location, get the news based on keyword. Store all these interactions in the database using core data.

projects.title: Real Estate Smart Code
projects.description: Smart contract for creating Real Estate Tokens, Staking Real Estate Tokens, and transferring Real Estate Tokens.
